## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/dwarfstreamer">DwarfStreamer</a> should call initialization code for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a>:

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2c23d23778140065e285b5263d7d905a">InitializeAllTargetInfos()</a>; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a162474ccafa6e8ccf58b2b60e7c63845">InitializeAllTargetMCs()</a>; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad27eabc8391834dce3a68261f8a334db">InitializeAllTargets()</a>; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af12a586afbaec83aa9cd8b7e9ab0c116">InitializeAllAsmPrinters()</a>; The Dwarf streaming logic.

All interactions with the MC layer that is used to build the debug information binary representation are handled in this class.

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarfstreamer-h">DWARFStreamer.h</a>.

### emitCompileUnitHeader() {#ae734c9b910054fa45f339c64f6a08d25}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DwarfStreamer::emitCompileUnitHeader (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/compileunit">CompileUnit</a> &amp; Unit, unsigned DwarfVersion)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit the compilation unit header for <code>Unit</code> in the debug&#95;info section.

As a side effect, this also switches the current Dwarf version of the MC layer to the one of U.getOrigUnit().

A Dwarf 4 section header is encoded as: uint32&#95;t Unit length (omitting this field) uint16&#95;t Version uint32&#95;t Abbreviation table offset uint8&#95;t Address size Leading to a total of 11 bytes.

A Dwarf 5 section header is encoded as: uint32&#95;t Unit length (omitting this field) uint16&#95;t Version uint8&#95;t Unit type uint8&#95;t Address size uint32&#95;t Abbreviation table offset Leading to a total of 12 bytes.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarfstreamer-h/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarfstreamer-h">DWARFStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarfstreamer-cpp/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarfstreamer-cpp">DWARFStreamer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
